name: The Last Element
description:
The Last Element - an indie platformer made by Ink Fox Games. This game puts you in a black and white world filled with strange creatures. You have to go on an extraordinary journey to find the last piece of the puzzle. Your weapons will be only lethal projectiles. Any hit on you results in immediate death. Can you challenge yourself and colle the puzzle? How many death you need to succeed?

  • Unique experience.
    Try fresh mix of madness & pain. This world won't leave you untouched.


  • Tricky traps.
    This world full of lies and cunning. Try to avoid all traps, you have only one chance.



  • Ultimate bosses.
    Those, who keep this world, strong and omnipotent. Fight with wild monsters, that ready to anything to kill you.
